message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for sale. It's a high-quality item that we believe could be very valuable to you. For this exceptional piece, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $120. I hope you find it worth considering. Let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in making a purchase.

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the quality of your product, $120 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable paying at this time. I'm interested in purchasing but would be willing to pay $80 for it. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your interest in our product. To better accommodate your budget while still valuing the quality of our item, I am willing to consider an offer of $95 for the product. I hope this revised price aligns more closely with your expectations. Please let me know if this works for you, or if there's anything else I can assist you with.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $95 is still a bit out of my budget.  I'm happy to meet you in the middle at $85. If you're willing to go that low, I'm ready to purchase.
